Dwight Deere Wiman https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Dwight_Deere_Wiman 0 Dwight Deere Wiman (August 8, 1895 – January 20, 1951) was an American silent movie actor, playwright and theatrical director. He is best known as a Broadway producer. Dwight_Deere_Wiman ( August_8_,_1895 – January_20_,_1951 ) was an_American_silent_movie_actor , playwright and theatrical_director . He is_best_known as a_Broadway_producer .
